name: QUOTE Candy bag 2 way Leather n Canvas -- blue stripes
description:
Brand New QUOTE Leather N’ Canvas 
Candy Bag 

The Candy bag is totally unique. 
Inspried for Deliciously Girly Candy

We design the bag and only made a small lot, so we pick the best material possible. 

There’re buckles on both sides of the bag that you can have 2 Looks of the bag. 
A Candy Look or an Extra Large oversize bag

Japanese Canvas with contrast leather trim. 
Orange cotton lined interior features 1 zipper pocket, 1 cellphone pocket.

Size:15"H x 19"W (measured when lay flat).
Or 15"H x 19"W x 4” (when buckle up as a candy)
Adjustable handles
Fabric: Light 14 Onz. cotton canvas
colors: blue stripes

Shoulder straps are adjustable, so the bag can be worn on the shoulder and will fit nicely under the arm but not too snugly.

The bag is label by QUOTE 
100% Handmade with care in Downtown Bangkok

name: QUOTE 3 ways leather Bag M---New color
description:
QUOTE 3 ways Tote/Messenger/shoulder Bag 

One of those quintessential Quote pieces you'll love for years. This shoulder bag is a great size and design. 
It will very easily throw over your shoulder, and carry all your necessities.

Japanese Canvas with contrast leather trim throughout the bag. Leather patch at both side handle and removable leather handle. Removable strap for messenger style also included. Cotton lined interior features 1 zipper pocket.

Size:14"H x 19"W x 4”D(measured when lay flat).
Real Leather handles
Fabric: red 14 onz canvas or
Blue canvas

The bag is label by QUOTE
Handmade with care in downtown Bangkok ;-)

name: Quote Pleated Bag -- Leather and Canvas --black
description:
One of those quintessential Quote Japan pieces you'll love for years. The bag is feminine but it also can be a casual bag, easy to carry...The bag is made from 14 onz. Canvas and fine leather . The lining is ultra durable and water resistant.

Deliberately placed random pleating creates a relaxed, eye catching and attractive bag. Roomy, feminine and a little bit edgy. We really like it!
This bag closes with a snap across the top keeping everything securely inside. There is a panel pockets on the inside

Approx. Dimensions: 15 x 15 in
Color: black
Leather: black

The bag is label by QUOTE
100% Handmade with care in Downtown Bangkok

name: QUOTE Canvas N Leather Saddle Drawstring Bag -- red/white
description:
One of those quintessential our Quote pieces you'll love for years.

The Saddle bag is totally unique. We only made a small lot, so we chose the best material possible. 

This shoulder bag is a great size and design. It will very easily throw over your shoulder, and carry all your necessities.

The bag has drawstring on one side of it.
Japanese Canvas Bag with contrast leather trim. 
Interior features 1 zipper pocket, 1 Leather cell phone pocket.

Size:10"H x 15"W (measured when lay flat) or 15"H (to the drawstring).
Fabric: Light 14 Onz. cotton canvas
colors: red and white
Leather: Brown


Perfect for carrying around your books, art supplies, etc

This is a really fun Bag. It has a nice wide body and looks great when worn on the shoulder. The open extends across the front of the bag which allows full access to the inside. The bag can be worn on the shoulder and will fit nicely under the arm but not too snugly.

to see more picture
http://www.flickr.com/photos/quotestudio/sets/

The bag is label by QUOTE
Handmade with care in downtown Bangkok ;-)

name: QUOTE Play Bag Leather N Canvas---Blue denim
description:
QUOTE 2 ways /Messenger/shoulder Play Bag 

This sturdy, pleated bag is wonderfully quirky: You can pull pleats apart to create your own look. 

Neat Pleats work bag Or
Fun Ruffle Play bag

It's created by hand in Thailand by Quote studio. It's light, and a leather foam bottom helps it keep its rectangular shape. 

Removable strap for messenger style also included. Cotton lined interior features 1 zipper pocket.

Size:15"H x 16.5"W x 3”D(measured when lay flat).
Leather handles
Fabric: 16 onz canvas

The bag is label by QUOTE
100% Handmade with care in downtown Bangkok ;-)

see more picture at
http://www.flickr.com/photos/quotestudio/sets/
